name: Clean the Grotto
description:
• Controls:  
  • A-D -Move  
  • Space -Jump 
  • (When stuck to Wall) W-S - Jump Direction
  • (When stuck to Wall) Hold Space for a stronger jump

Filthy humans are dumping their toxic waste barrels into your beautiful grotto! This is unaccaptable! Collect as many barrels as you can and put them in your sack so you can take it out later.

Made for 42 Jam . This version is a bit more polished. Go check out the other great games submitted to jam.
